trans-unit.source: Occurs when the shared recognizer finalizes an asynchronous recognition operation for emulated input.
trans-unit.target: 当共享的识别器终结模拟输入的异步识别操作时发生。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> method begins an asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>方法开始一个异步识别操作。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the `EmulateRecognizeCompleted` event when it finalizes the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 识别器引发`EmulateRecognizeCompleted`事件时它完成异步操作。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous recognition operation can raise the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> events.
trans-unit.target: 异步识别操作可引发<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event is the last such event that the recognizer raises for a given operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted>事件是最后一个这种情况下识别器引发指定的操作。

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for an `EmulateRecognizeCompleted` event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建的委托`EmulateRecognizeCompleted`事件，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[事件和委托](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: The following example is part of a console application that loads a speech recognition grammar and demonstrates asynchronous emulated input, the associated recognition results, and the associated events raised by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例是一个控制台应用程序加载语音识别语法并演示异步模拟的输入、 关联的识别结果，以及由语音识别器引发的关联的事件的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If Windows Speech Recognition is not running, then starting this application will also start Windows Speech Recognition.
trans-unit.target: 如果未运行 Windows 语音识别，然后启动此应用程序也将启动 Windows 语音识别。

trans-unit.source: If Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** mode, then <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> always returns null.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Windows 语音识别在**休眠**模式，然后<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>始终返回 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> object is ready to process speech.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> 对象是否准备好处理语音。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> object is performing speech recognition; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果此 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> 对象执行语音识别；否则<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Changes to this property do not affect other instances of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> class.
trans-unit.target: 更改此属性不会影响的其他实例<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>类。

trans-unit.source: By default, the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A> property is `true` for a newly instantiated instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>属性是`true`的新实例化实例<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>。

trans-unit.source: While the recognizer is disabled, none of the recognizer's speech recognition grammars are available for recognition operations.
trans-unit.target: 识别器处于禁用状态，而的识别器的语音识别语法都可用于识别操作。

trans-unit.source: Setting the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A> property has no effect on the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 设置在识别器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>属性不起作用上识别器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar" /> objects that are loaded in this <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取在此 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar" /> 实例中加载的 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar" /> objects that the application loaded into the current instance of the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序加载到共享识别器的当前实例的 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: This property does not return any speech recognition grammars loaded by another application.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不返回任何语音识别语法另一个应用程序加载的。

trans-unit.source: The following example outputs information to the console for each speech recognition grammar loaded into the shared speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将输出到的控制台为加载到共享的语音识别器每个语音识别语法的信息。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition grammar to load.
trans-unit.target: 加载语音识别语法。

trans-unit.source: Loads a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: 加载语音识别语法。

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer throws an exception if the speech recognition grammar is already loaded, is being asynchronously loaded, or has failed to load into any recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 如果语音识别语法已加载，正在以异步方式加载，或无法加载到任何识别器，则共享识别器引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: 如果识别器正在运行，应用程序必须使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>暂停之前加载、 卸载、 启用，或禁用语法的语音识别引擎。

trans-unit.source: To load a speech recognition grammar asynchronously, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以异步方式加载语音识别语法，请使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example is part of a console application that loads a speech recognition grammar and demonstrates asynchronous emulated input, the associated recognition results, and the associated events raised by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例是一个控制台应用程序加载语音识别语法并演示异步模拟的输入、 关联的识别结果，以及由语音识别器引发的关联的事件的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If Windows Speech Recognition is not running, then starting this application will also start Windows Speech Recognition.
trans-unit.target: 如果未运行 Windows 语音识别，然后启动此应用程序也将启动 Windows 语音识别。

trans-unit.source: If Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state, then <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> always returns null.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Windows 语音识别在**休眠**状态，然后<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>始终返回 null。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition grammar to load.
trans-unit.target: 加载语音识别语法。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously loads a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: 异步加载语音识别语法。

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer completes this asynchronous operation, it raises a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 当识别器完成这一异步操作时，将引发<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer throws an exception if the speech recognition grammar is already loaded, is being asynchronously loaded, or has failed to load into any recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 如果语音识别语法已加载，正在以异步方式加载，或无法加载到任何识别器，则在识别器引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: 如果识别器正在运行，应用程序必须使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>暂停之前加载、 卸载、 启用，或禁用语法的语音识别引擎。

trans-unit.source: To load a speech recognition grammar synchronously, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以同步方式加载语音识别语法，请使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammar%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer finishes the asynchronous loading of a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: 当识别器完成语音识别语法的异步加载时发生。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method initiates an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 识别器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>方法启动异步操作。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the `LoadGrammarCompleted` event when it completes the operation.
trans-unit.target: 识别器引发`LoadGrammarCompleted`事件完成该操作。

trans-unit.source: To get the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object that the recognizer loaded, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象识别器加载，请使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A>属性关联的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: To get the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects the recognizer has loaded, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Grammars%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取当前<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象识别器已加载，使用识别器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Grammars%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a `LoadGrammarCompleted` event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建的委托`LoadGrammarCompleted`事件，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[事件和委托](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a shared speech recognizer, and then creates two types of grammars for recognizing specific words and for accepting free dictation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建共享的语音识别器，，，然后创建两种类型的语法，用于识别特定的词和接受免费听写。

trans-unit.source: The example asynchronously loads all the created grammars to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 本示例以异步方式加载到识别器创建的所有语法。

trans-unit.source: Handlers for the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> events write to the console the name of the grammar that was used to perform the recognition and the text of the recognition result, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序识别器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>事件写入到控制台的语法，用于执行识别和识别结果的文本分别的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of alternate recognition results that the shared recognizer returns for each recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置共享识别器为每个识别操作返回的备用识别结果的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of alternate results that the speech recognizer returns for each recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 语音识别器返回每个标识操作的替换结果的最大数目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> class contains the collection of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> objects that represent other candidate interpretations of the input.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>类包含的集合<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>表示输入其他候选解释的对象。

trans-unit.source: The default value for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.MaxAlternates%2A> is 10.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.MaxAlternates%2A>为 10。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the shared recognizer pauses recognition operations while an application is handling a <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，此值指示共享识别器是否在应用程序处理 <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized" /> 事件时暂停识别操作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the shared recognizer waits to process input while any application is handling the <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized" /> event; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果共享识别器等待处理输入，当所有应用程序处理 <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized" /> 事件时；否则<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true`, if within the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event handler your application needs to change the state of the speech recognition service or change the loaded or enabled speech recognition grammars before the speech recognition service processes more input.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为`true`，如果在<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>你的应用程序需要更改语音识别服务的状态或更改之前语音识别服务加载或启用语音识别语法的事件处理程序处理更多输入。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> property to `true` causes each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event handler in every application to block the Windows speech recognition service.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>属性`true`导致每个<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>中每个应用程序阻止 Windows 语音识别服务事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: To synchronize the changes to the shared recognizer with your application state, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要与应用程序状态同步对共享识别器的更改，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.PauseRecognizerOnRecognition%2A> is `true`, during the execution of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> handler the speech recognition service pauses and buffers new audio input as it arrives.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.PauseRecognizerOnRecognition%2A>是`true`，执行期间<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>处理程序语音识别服务暂停，在其到达时缓冲新音频输入。

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event handler exits, the speech recognition service resumes recognition and starts processing information from its input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 一次<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>事件处理程序退出，语音识别服务继续识别并开始处理从其输入缓冲区的信息。

trans-unit.source: To enable or disable the speech recognition service, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用或禁用语音识别服务，请使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current location of the recognizer in the audio input that it is processing.
trans-unit.target: 获取在处理的音频输入中的识别器当前位置。

trans-unit.source: The position of the recognizer in the audio input that it is processing.
trans-unit.target: 识别器的位置在处理音频的输入。

trans-unit.source: The `RecognizerAudioPosition` property references the recognizer's position in processing its audio input.
trans-unit.target: `RecognizerAudioPosition`属性引用中处理其音频输入识别器的位置。

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>属性引用在其生成的音频流中的输入的设备的位置。

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: 这些位置可以是不同的。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the recognizer has received input for which it has not yet generated a recognition result then the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果收到识别器输入其具有不但生成识别结果则的值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>属性小于的值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the shared speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 获取共享语音识别器的相关信息。

trans-unit.source: Information about the shared speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 该共享语音识别器的相关信息。

trans-unit.source: This property returns information about the speech recognizer in use by Windows Speech Recognition.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回由 Windows 语音识别中使用语音识别器有关的信息。

trans-unit.source: The following example sends information about the shared recognizer to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例向控制台发送有关共享的识别信息。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer pauses to synchronize recognition and other operations.
trans-unit.target: 当识别器暂停以同步识别和其他操作时发生。

trans-unit.source: Applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause a running instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> before modifying its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序必须使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>暂停正在运行的实例<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>之前修改其<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, while the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> is paused, you can load, unload, enable, and disable <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: 例如，虽然<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>是暂停，你可以加载、 卸载、 启用和禁用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> raises this event when it is ready to accept modifications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>已准备好接受修改时引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建的委托<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[事件和委托](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a console application that loads and unloads <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的控制台应用程序加载和卸载<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象。

trans-unit.source: The application uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method to request the speech recognition engine to pause so it can receive an update.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>方法来请求暂停以便它可以接收更新的语音识别引擎。

trans-unit.source: The application then loads or unloads a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序，然后加载或卸载<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象。

trans-unit.source: At each update, a handler for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event writes the name and status of the currently loaded <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects to the console.
trans-unit.target: 在每个更新的处理程序<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件写入的名称和状态的当前加载<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>到控制台的对象。

trans-unit.source: As grammars are loaded and unloaded, the application first recognizes the names of farm animals, then the names of farm animals and the names of fruits, then only the names of fruits.
trans-unit.target: 加载和卸载语法时，应用程序将首先识别场动物的名称场动物的名称和水果的名称，然后仅水果的名称。

trans-unit.source: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state.
trans-unit.target: 请求共享识别器暂停和更新其状态。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to synchronize changes to the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法将更改同步到共享识别器。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you load or unload a speech recognition grammar while the recognizer is processing input, use this method and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event to synchronize your application behavior with the state of the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你加载或卸载语音识别语法，当在识别器正在处理输入，请使用此方法与<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件，以使你应用程序的行为与在识别器状态同步。

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, the recognizer pauses or completes asynchronous operations and generates a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event.
trans-unit.target: 当调用此方法时，识别器暂停或完成异步操作并生成<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event handler can then modify the state of the recognizer in between recognition operations.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件处理程序然后可以修改的识别操作之间识别器状态。

trans-unit.source: When this method is called:
trans-unit.target: 当调用此方法时：

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is not processing input, the recognizer immediately generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果识别器未处理输入，识别器将立即生成<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is processing input that consists of silence or background noise, the recognizer pauses the recognition operation and generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果识别器正在处理静默或背景噪音组成的输入时，识别器暂停识别操作，并生成<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is processing input that does not consist of silence or background noise, the recognizer completes the recognition operation and then generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果识别器正在处理的静默或背景噪音不是由组成的输入时，识别器完成的识别操作，然后生成<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件。

trans-unit.source: While the recognizer is handling the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event:
trans-unit.target: 虽然处理识别器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件：

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not process input, and the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property remains the same.
trans-unit.target: 识别器不会处理输入和的值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>属性保持不变。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer continues to collect input, and the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> property can change.
trans-unit.target: 识别器继续收集输入和的值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>属性可以更改。

trans-unit.source: To change whether the shared recognizer pauses recognition operations while an application is handling a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.PauseRecognizerOnRecognition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改是否共享识别器时处理应用程序将暂停识别操作<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>事件，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.PauseRecognizerOnRecognition%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a console application that loads and unloads <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的控制台应用程序加载和卸载<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象。

trans-unit.source: The application uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method to request the speech recognition engine to pause so it can receive an update.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>方法来请求暂停以便它可以接收更新的语音识别引擎。

trans-unit.source: The application then loads or unloads a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序，然后加载或卸载<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象。

trans-unit.source: At each update, a handler for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event writes the name and status of the currently loaded <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects to the console.
trans-unit.target: 在每个更新的处理程序<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件写入的名称和状态的当前加载<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>到控制台的对象。

trans-unit.source: As grammars are loaded and unloaded, the application first recognizes the names of farm animals, then the names of farm animals and the names of fruits, then only the names of fruits.
trans-unit.target: 加载和卸载语法时，应用程序将首先识别场动物的名称场动物的名称和水果的名称，然后仅水果的名称。

trans-unit.source: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state.
trans-unit.target: 请求共享识别器暂停和更新其状态。

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 当识别器生成<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>是`null`。

trans-unit.source: To provide a user token, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供用户标记，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To specify an audio position offset, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的音频位置偏移量，请使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 用户定义信息包含该操作的信息。

trans-unit.source: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state and provides a user token for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: 请求共享识别器暂停和更新其状态并为关联的事件提供用户标记。

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> contains the value of the `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 当识别器生成<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>包含值的`userToken`参数。

trans-unit.source: To specify an audio position offset, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的音频位置偏移量，请使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 用户定义信息包含该操作的信息。

trans-unit.source: The offset from the current <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition" /> to delay the request.
trans-unit.target: 从当前到延迟请求的 <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition" /> 偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state and provides an offset and a user token for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: 请求共享识别器暂停和更新其状态并为关联的事件提供偏移量和用户标记。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not initiate the recognizer update request until the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> equals the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> plus the value of the `audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 识别器并不会启动之前识别器识别器更新请求<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>等于当前<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>加的值上`audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate`参数。

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> contains the value of the `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 当识别器生成<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>包含值的`userToken`参数。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer detects input that it can identify as speech.
trans-unit.target: 当识别器删除它可以标识为语音的输入时发生。

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer can raise this event in response to input.
trans-unit.target: 共享识别器可以引发此事件以响应输入。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs> object indicates location in the input stream where the recognizer detected speech.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>属性关联的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs>对象指示在其中识别器检测到语音的输入流中的位置。

trans-unit.source: For more information see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> properties and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息请参阅<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>属性和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected> event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建的委托<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>事件，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[事件和委托](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: The following example is part of a console application for choosing origin and destination cities for a flight.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例是用于选择为航班的起点和目标城市的控制台应用程序的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The application recognizes phrases such as "I want to fly from Miami to Chicago."
trans-unit.target: 应用程序识别短语，例如"我想亲自从迈阿密前往芝加哥。"

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected> event to report the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> each time speech is detected.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>到报表的事件<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>检测到每个时间语音。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer has recognized a word or words that may be a component of multiple complete phrases in a grammar.
trans-unit.target: 当识别器已识别可以为语法中多个完整的短语的组件的一个字或多个字时发生。

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer can raise this event when the input is ambiguous.
trans-unit.target: 共享识别器可以引发此事件时的输入是不明确。

trans-unit.source: For example, for a speech recognition grammar that supports recognition of either "new game please" or "new game", "new game please" is an unambiguous input, and "new game" is an ambiguous input.
trans-unit.target: 例如，对于支持识别的语音识别语法"新游戏请"或"新游戏"，"新游戏请"是明确的输入，和"新游戏"是不明确的输入。

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized> event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建的委托<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized>事件，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[事件和委托](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: The following example recognizes phrases such as "Display the list of artists in the jazz category".
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例识别短语，例如"显示艺术家爵士乐类别中的列表"。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized> event to display incomplete phrase fragments in the console as they are recognized.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized>事件以在控制台中显示它们识别不完整的短语片段。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer receives input that does not match any of the speech recognition grammars it has loaded.
trans-unit.target: 当识别器接收不与它已加载的任何语音识别语法匹配的输入时发生。

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer raises this event if it determines that input does not match with sufficient confidence any of the loaded speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: 如果确定，输入不足够的置信度的任何不匹配加载的语音识别语法，共享识别器将引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> contains the rejected <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs>包含拒绝<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>对象。

trans-unit.source: Confidence thresholds for the shared recognizer, managed by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>, are associated with a user profile and stored in the Windows registry.
trans-unit.target: 在共享识别，也就是由管理器的置信度阈值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>、 具有用户配置文件相关联并存储在 Windows 注册表中。

trans-unit.source: Applications should not write changes to the registry for the properties of the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序不应写入属性的共享识别器注册表的更改。

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected> event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建的委托<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected>事件，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[事件和委托](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: The following example recognizes phrases such as "Display the list of artists in the jazz category" or "Display albums gospel".
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例会将短语，如"爵士乐类别中显示的艺术家列表"或"显示专辑 gospel"。

trans-unit.source: The example uses a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected> event to display a notification in the console when the speech input cannot be matched to the contents of the grammar with sufficient confidence to produce a successful recognition.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用的处理程序<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected>事件以在控制台中显示的通知时语音输入不能充分保证生成成功识别与匹配内容的语法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer receives input that matches one of its speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: 当识别器接收与其语音识别语法匹配的输入时发生。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the `SpeechRecognized` event if it determines with sufficient confidence that input matches one of the loaded and enabled speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: 识别器引发`SpeechRecognized`事件如果输入与匹配加载并已启用语音识别语法之一的足够自信地确定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> contains the accepted <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs>包含接受<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>对象。

trans-unit.source: Confidence thresholds for the shared recognizer, managed by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>, are associated with a user profile and stored in the Windows registry.
trans-unit.target: 在共享识别，也就是由管理器的置信度阈值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>、 具有用户配置文件相关联并存储在 Windows 注册表中。

trans-unit.source: Applications should not write changes to the registry for the properties of the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序不应写入属性的共享识别器注册表的更改。

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer receives input that matches a grammar, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object can raise the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: 当识别器收到与匹配语法中，输入的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象可以引发<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event is raised prior to the speech recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>在语音识别器之前引发事件<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>事件。

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建的委托<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>事件，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[事件和委托](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: The following example is part of a console application that loads a speech recognition grammar and demonstrates speech input to the shared recognizer, the associated recognition results, and the associated events raised by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例是一个控制台应用程序以加载语音识别语法演示语音输入连接到共享识别器、 关联的识别结果中和由语音识别器引发的关联的事件的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If Windows Speech Recognition is not running, then starting this application will also start Windows Speech Recognition.
trans-unit.target: 如果未运行 Windows 语音识别，然后启动此应用程序也将启动 Windows 语音识别。

trans-unit.source: Spoken input such as "I want to fly from Chicago to Miami" will trigger a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: 例如"我想亲自从芝加哥到迈阿密"将触发读出输入<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>事件。

trans-unit.source: Speaking the phrase "Fly me from Houston to Chicago " will not trigger a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: 不会触发语速短语"飞 me 从休斯顿到芝加哥"<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>事件。

trans-unit.source: The example uses a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> event to display successfully recognized phrases and the semantics they contain in the console.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用的处理程序<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>事件以显示成功识别短语以及它们包含在控制台中的语义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> 对象的状态。

trans-unit.source: The state of the <see langword="SpeechRecognizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="SpeechRecognizer" /> 对象的状态。

trans-unit.source: This read-only property indicates whether the shared recognizer resident in Windows is in the `Stopped` or the `Listening` state.
trans-unit.target: 此只读属性指示是否为驻留在 Windows 中共享的识别`Stopped`或`Listening`状态。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参见 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> 枚举。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the running state of the Windows Desktop Speech Technology recognition engine changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 Windows“桌面语音技术”识别引擎的运行状态更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer raises this event when the state of Windows Speech Recognition changes to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState.Listening> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState.Stopped> state.
trans-unit.target: 共享识别器引发此事件时 Windows 语音识别的状态更改为<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState.Listening>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState.Stopped>状态。

trans-unit.source: To get the state of the shared recognizer at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs.RecognizerState%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要在事件的时间获取共享识别器的状态，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs.RecognizerState%2A>属性关联的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: To get the current state of the shared recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取共享识别器的当前状态，请使用识别器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建的委托<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged>事件，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[事件和委托](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a shared speech recognizer, and then creates two types of grammars for recognizing specific words and for accepting free dictation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建共享的语音识别器，，，然后创建两种类型的语法，用于识别特定的词和接受免费听写。

trans-unit.source: The example asynchronously loads all the created grammars to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 本示例以异步方式加载到识别器创建的所有语法。

trans-unit.source: A handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> event uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> method to put Windows Recognition in "listening" mode.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged>事件使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>方法要 Windows 识别置于"侦听"模式。

trans-unit.source: Unloads all speech recognition grammars from the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 从共享识别器卸载所有语音识别语法。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is currently loading a grammar asynchronously, this method waits until the grammar is loaded, before it unloads all of the recognizer's grammars.
trans-unit.target: 如果识别器当前正在以异步方式加载语法，此方法等待，直到之前它卸载识别器的语法的所有加载语法。

trans-unit.source: To unload a specific grammar, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadGrammar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要卸载特定语法，请使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadGrammar%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The grammar to unload.
trans-unit.target: 卸载的语法。

trans-unit.source: Unloads a specified speech recognition grammar from the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 从共享识别器卸载指定语音识别语法。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: 如果识别器正在运行，应用程序必须使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>暂停之前加载、 卸载、 启用，或禁用语法的语音识别引擎。

trans-unit.source: To unload all grammars, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要卸载的所有语法，请使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>方法。
